# `msos` R package

Contains necessary Multivariate Analysis methods and data sets used
in John Marden's Multivariate Statistics: Old School (2015) [ISBN: 978-1456538835].
This is also a companion package for the STAT 571: Multivariate Analysis course
at the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign (UIUC).
